title: Top 10 famous bands known for one member
text:
Cape Town – Can you name more than one member of Maroon 5? What about Coldplay? Or even Nickelback? Sometimes it's tough to look past the lead singer and get to know the other musos on stage.

That's why entertainment site Ms Mojo is looking at the Top 10 Bands Known for One Member. This video examines big-ticket bands and artists whose reputation and popularity is closely tied to one member.

From Weezer's Rivers Cuomo to Chad Kroeger, Mark Knopfler, Adam Levine and Blondie, these are the names you most associate with the music you're so fond of.
description: Not just any member, they're the face of the music!
